name: Inside (itch) (Ghina Al Halabi)
description:
In a 40 hour game jam, this game was made by Oyuncu21 and I, and our theme was "borders". We made a game that shows a character trying to escape the dark space of his head, to finally escape and realize that a peaceful space exists inside his head.
___________________________________
This game is a very short game, that might be expanded or worked on in the future.
